text: The Marrying Man (also known as Too Hot to Handle) is a 1991 American romantic comedy movie released by Hollywood Pictures. Kim Basinger plays Vicki. Alec Baldwin plays Charley. Elisabeth Shue plays Adele. The movie received poor reviews from the critics. Basinger earned a Golden Raspberry Award nomination for Worst Actress. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Disney movies Category:Movies composed by David Newman Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: The Marrying Man
